featured.text: As many as 60 pilot whales swam ashore.
The pilot project dedicated to developing the cactus biogas generator began in the south of Mexico City.
A marine pilot is a boat pilot with specialized knowledge of a particular port or harbor.

other.text: The 60 pilot whales swam ashore as a result of (A) a large winter storm off the coast of Cape Cod. (B) a behavior currently unknown to scientists.
Which of the following is part of the knowledge that a marine pilot must have? (A)
Without the services of a marine pilot, docking ships would be hazardous.
The pilot whales died on the beaches of Cape Cod due to (A) the lack of salt water to facilitate their respiration.
Almost everything, from food to machinery, comes by way of the sea in huge ships piloted by captains.
The pilot is responsible for not only the safety of the ship but also the protection of the port and the marine environment.
This captain is called a marine pilot.
A marine pilot goes on board at a crucial time and controls the vessel based on his or her knowledge of the port and the situation at hand.
Scientists are studying the suicidal behavior of pilot whales.
The pilot is needed to direct large ships into a port, where there are often deep water channels surrounded by shallower seabeds.

definition.zh_def: 駕駛飛機的人，尤其是商業或軍事飛行的專業人士。
definition.en_def: A person who operates the flying controls of an aircraft.
definition.example: The pilot skillfully landed the plane despite the strong winds.
